otherNames: Guimi He Wo Qiang Laogong, 閨蜜和我搶老公
synopsis: Mansi and her friend Joana exchanged their identities due to a car accident. Unfortunately, Mansi fell into Roberto’s hands and was intimidated by that man. Worse still, Joana wanted to steal her husband Louis. Mansi simply could not accept it. Can she get out of trouble and return with her love?
